item.title: Judge’s Pause Of Murthy V. Missouri Threatens Effort To Dismantle Government-Censorship Complex
item.description: A judge has paused litigation against the former Biden administration. If the case is dismissed, it could enable future censorship.

item.title: ‘Correct The Records’: Trump Administration Requests NCAA Strip Men Of Titles Stolen From Women
item.description: The Education Department requested that the NCAA 'correct the records' of all the female athletes whose titles and awards were stolen by males.

item.title: Exclusive: Los Angeles Pushes Radical Gender Ideology On City Employees In Defiance Of Trump’s Executive Order
item.description: As the leaked citywide training shows, this is not an isolated incident — but widespread institutional capture.

item.title: ‘Dune: Part Two’ Isn’t The Only Accidentally Pro-Life Hollywood Blockbuster
item.description: In Oscar-nominated 'Dune: Part Two,' Lady Jessica spends much of the movie communicating telepathically with her unborn daughter, Alia.

item.title: How Vance’s ‘Do You Hear Yourself?’ Moment Helped Me See The Propaganda Press For What It Is
item.description: J.D. Vance asking Martha Raddatz, 'Do you hear yourself?' was the political reality check I desperately needed.
